QuestData.Title: Nemesis: Becoming Death
QuestData.Description: You have chosen your quarry and surely soon they will feel your merciless wrath, but first you must venture out into the wilds of Draenor and rip out the still-beating heart of a troll in mortal combat. Return here with your prize.$B$BThrough the heart of your enemy the spirits will attune your senses, granting you second sight and keenness in hearing - all to stalk your prey and claim dominance.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill a Troll Player in Player versus Player combat while in Draenor and retrieve their Troll Heart.
